title: Kethcup Relish
directions: Process, ½ cup onion, pepper, garlic, tomatoes, vinegar, molasses, and black pepper until smooth.
Pour mixture into a saucepot and cook at medium low heat for 25 mins, stirring occasionally.
Pour into a covered container and refigerate for 1 hour.
Pulse mixture, ¼ cup onion, pickles, and mustard until desired smoothness.
